reviews.text: This hotel has a convenient location,  affordable and clean. But you get what you paid for. No microwave, no mini fridge, almost no furniture in the room,  and saw a few roaches in the pool area, since it's outdoors anyway

Extremely noisy hotel. There is no insulation between rooms, straight concrete blocks building. If anyone is talking outside you can hear it in the room. Curtains are not full black out and windows have no solid locks. You hear the train whistling from 4~5 am every hour. I had no real hot water in the shower at 6:30 am, I did not see a boiler on property I think they use a solar heater for the water. The place was clean. paid $30 US will stay at hotel Mary further down the street next time & pay $55US.
The Hotel is really confortable, you can visit it any time you like and you will always recieve good attention from the workers
Service is very good in all hotels
Clean efficient  staff but hard befs
My experience was exceptional. They made me feel at home, and always on top of my security and my safety. the room clean and the restaurant OMG amazing. Definitely we will be back

The restaurant in the entrance is good, the food is good and for the most part the costumer service is favorable. I would of without a doubt given this place 5 stars, however My experience with a waiter brought it down to 4 stars, after wanting to give it only 3.

The issue was that I ordered a shrimp cocktail, but it was too spicy, something that I was not notified of before it was served to me. I asked the waiter to change it for one that wasn't spicy...

(Before I continue I want to point out that he was a male in his late 40s and didn't seem to be in a good mood, his costumer service was terrible, we asked questions about the menu and the food and his answers were short and irritated.)

He refused to change the order, saying that I should have told him when I ordered, I tried to explain to him that it made no sense to me, because the menu didn't say it was spicy.

Eventually another waiter pulled up and I asked to speak to their supervisor,she said it was her & seemed more hospitable, she also told me I should of told them I didn't want it spicy from the beginning, I reiterated what I had told her coworker and shortly after, she accepted to bring me a cocktail they wasn't spicy.

Don't know much about the rooms, but the restaurant is pretty adorable and offers a lot of food veriaty. As in any other restaurant, the services is good but not great. The parking lot is alright. I'd say it's more a dinner place than a lunch one. The location is pretty good actually, it is close to the city park, ATMs and is located in one of the main streets of the town.
Good clean hotel, very close to Centro (5 minute walk).  Excellent restaurant on site with bar.  Secure parking and excellent staff.
Nice central locatio room was fairly clean quiet and cozy. Price was pretty good too.

An excellent educational institution with 36 years of foundation offering educational excellence.
Intellectual development, values ‚Äã‚Äãall focused on the common good, contribute to the improvement of the world.
Today I present the beautiful medal of your annual race, a complete success.

Their facilities are very nice, they even have a very well-kept lake with their fish üê†üêü, the visit was pleasant, the guards were very kind in giving us directions on where to go to the place we were going

In this school you can study middle school, high school, university and postgraduate degrees.
Diplomas, language courses, etc.
The costs are high.
There is a cafeteria, library and other adequate facilities that create an environment of trust and you can develop.

The service for a medical certificate is terrible, the person (woman) who takes the blood type does not know what it is to have an attitude of service, she speaks smack, she does not know how to write names correctly, she does not know kindness, it is disastrous. Those who are in charge of preparing the certificate are the same, they do not like their work, therefore they do not provide good service, they do it as if they wanted to finish in a minute and not know more, it is unfortunate, being such an important institution to have those people there, it is a shame

For the tenth time it is closed. There is no one who issues the certificates and they denied the service for transporting an elderly person with a stroke, which would result in the death of the patient.

As a suggestion that they better train their staff or at least try to hire empathetic, kind and supportive people because as a complaint the person at the counter today, Wednesday, October 11, 2023, denied me the Medical Service for my son, telling me that the doctor was not going to want to treat him but still charging me for the consultation and did not at least allow me to go to ask the doctor if he could treat my son, telling me with a rude attitude that he only had a question for him. have to pay for the consultation.

Terrible attention, I do not recommend that you get the medical certificate for your driver's license, from the moment you enter the doctor assumes that you are not going to pass the vision exam, based on the time you have with your glasses! Without knowing that I go to my ophthalmologist every year!  He serves you reluctantly and does not inform you! Better go to the similar pharmacy, it's also cheaper!!
Can you guide me to know if tomorrow, they do clinical tests for marriage and certification, at what time, and the cost? Thank you so much

Was friendly and always tried to make things right. A train service blares it's horn and woke me up several times. Not all guests heard it though

This place was amazing for the price. Stayed a week here while vacationing and seeing family. The pool was very nice and the staff was as friendly as can be. The restaraunt food was delicious. I would definitely recommend staying here if you‚Äôre touring. Most of the staff are bilingual and if you speak with one that it is not, they are quick to find another staff member to aid with conversation with little to no complications. They were very helpful to all of my family needs in regards to accommodation, transportation and other needs, I don't know hot to thank them enough. Rooms were clean and fairly Large enough to rest peacefully at night. Price is fair and customer service is excelent, my family and I are very happy to have stayed here, we all agree that it was a good choice.
Restaurant food it good and service is excelente. Thanks to.management and whole hotel staff, mil gracias y que dios los bendiga a todos por ser muy serviciales y helpful. I went on July 30, 2024 to withdraw 50,000 pesos. The lady at the window asked me for my INE. And my Debit card, for this it is worth mentioning that I am one of the "priority" clients, after validating my documents, it tells me that it cannot give me that amount due to the legislation of the Bank of Mexico. For me, it is very disconcerting that after validating my documents and giving me the money, he tells me that I have to wait 24 hours. In the worst case scenario, I am imagining that he cannot give me that amount of money because he has not yet notified his fellow thieves and they take that amount from me leaving the branch. I had to go to Santander to carry out the same operation and they were actually able to give me the amount of evidence I needed, in addition to that I also went to the CPM sofipo and they can also give me a large amount of money. TERRIBLE SERVICE FROM BANAMEX, only the TC Cotsco can be rescued and we swim.
Very bad experiences, the staff is terrible and they are totally uninformed, the service and attention is really terrible.
I just want to make an appointment to update my file.  And it doesn't give me a choice nor can I communicate with anyone who can advise me.
If you are in a hurry don't come here. At the moment they do not have ATM machines.
It's a shame that they don't have service on Saturdays. Cross out.

nombre: Level Middle School Superior of Celaya

reviews.text: Like

It has been almost 3 years since I graduated from this beautiful and deteriorated school, without a doubt some of the best moments of my life were spent there (despite only being in person for one year due to the pandemic). Like every student I cried, I laughed, I got angry, I learned and above all I had fun and I got to know each other, thanks to the independence and activities that it offers, the teachers guided me if I had any doubts, no matter how minor they seemed, I remember their classes with a lot of love and stress hahaha; I met great people who remain my friends to this day. I will always remember this stage with great affection and nostalgia, I hope that whoever reads this can live or is living great adventures.

One of the best public high schools in Celaya, belonging to the Higher Secondary School of the University of Guanajuato
They carry out many activities throughout the semester such as plays, music presentations, dance, singing, and more.
Without forgetting the altars that they make days before All Saints' Day.
Cruising in the bathrooms on the floor and those on the stairs

If you want an advanced educational system, this is your best option, an excellent alternative to study, it has everything supported: food scholarships, scholarships for high average and scholarships for socioeconomic support, also with innovation projects, art, design, among others. It has complete resources, a chemistry and physics laboratory, a computer classroom with modern equipment, protectors in the classrooms, etc. It also has attentive student service in the offices and although the teachers are demanding, it is worth the effort. Not for nothing does it have great prestige.
A usual costco store. It was so crowded even it was Monday but the store was confortable, and so the lines to pay. The store is clean and organized.

Big variety of items they need to work on the long lines

Corporate America should pattern their own business after the enormous success of Costco. Employees are considered a major component in their business plan and it shows.  They are trained to care. Care about the service they provide and care about the customer.  That‚Äôs hard to beat.

descripcion: hardware_store, electronics_store, home_goods_store, store, point_of_interest, establishment

reviews.text: At first I was little it bit skeptical with the delivery time. Home Depot meet my expectations and highly recommend home Depot! They keep me informed during the delivery time !

Clean, well stocked Home Depot. We went for citronella candles and batteries and were directed right away to where they were. Nice display of Halloween and Day of the Dead decorations. Pay for parking, but free if you buy something. Validate card with cashier.

They have great service. When I went last night it was packed and full of people. It's usually not crowded but for some reason it was.

I would say that it's one of the best customer service Homedepot has. They treat you well and help you to the best as they can. The only thing I could say is that it's hard at times to obtain someone to help you. They always play as they are busy to help or they take their time to help you out even if you press the "Help" button. They come turn it off and they just tell you that someone will come in a minute and they take a while. I would say that one time it took almost 30 minutes for someone to come and help me do a work order some doors.

But once they someone arrived, they have a great service.

Bad service. We ordered furniture and they were scheduled for delivery a week after. That day came and went, no delivery, no message from them. We tried to call but nobody answers. Finally, we managed to get hold of someone that told us the delivery date was postponed a week. That day came and went, still no message from them or calls or anything. And still almost impossible to get hold of someone that can tell us anything. I will never order from Home Depot Celaya again!
Personnel, clean and reorder the products during the day when customer are shopping. It can be dangerous to the customer. Normally, this actions are executed when customers are not around.

From colonial history to living culture: the House of Tithe keeps more than 500 years of secrets. Built by orders of Hern√°n P√©rez Bocanegra, a soldier of Cort√©s, this building was a grain warehouse, a shelter during floods and even an agricultural bank. Today, its walls resonate with belly dance and classical ballet.
Its fa√ßade has a 16th century fa√ßade with neoclassical influence, beamed ceilings and interior patios. Here they have popular guitar workshops, artisanal haute couture and temporary exhibitions in their galleries. Some claim that in their basements there are remains of a walled-up woman, although the official history speaks of floods and shelters.
There is always something interesting to see, in addition to the beautiful and rustic facilities it has.

Wonderful cultural and artistic venue, if you come to Celaya, do not hesitate to visit its art galleries of artists from Celaya and the region, walk through its patios, see if its architectural beauty shares its atar de muerte.

They took me to the counter, but a cute girl with glasses didn't want to serve me and sent me to the desk. Because of him I had to wait almost 2 hours to be attended to.
Deficiency in their communication with clients, there is no adequate attention on telephone or WhatsApp. Few staff attending sales area

I didn't like the attention of the employee, she limited herself to the basics and at all times she looked at me with notable discomfort, I don't know why, my hair wasn't disheveled, I was friendly, I specifically went to ask about the apartment I need.
Low quality care. They do not show customer interest. They need training in service quality
Their products are excellent but their delivery service is shit.
Top quality products and a wide variety of designs, in addition to providing good service, they show you products according to what you are looking for.

Fix your location
I went to where maps showed me and the location is not there
A place to choose the ideal dress for your xv, wedding, and have that magical moment
Very good service
When I got married I told them hahaha
Excellent service

We suck!!! Better buy pre-owned units guaranteed at the agencies, my car lasted 2 months and I ended up paying 38 thousand pesos for the repair at the VW agency, since they disclaim and do not give any guarantee.

I bought a car trusting that nothing was wrong with it, when I drove it everything was fine but after 10 days it started producing white smoke from the exhaust, I took them to have it fixed and they changed a part that they said was the problem but it wasn't. Half a year after the purchase, the engine oil ran out completely, I had to take it to the agency to fix it and it ended up costing me 9 thousand pesos since it was a problem with the engine. Check carefully before buying and do not believe that because they are ANCA members their cars are in good condition.

I bought a Manager from Guadalajara, I really thought it would be a lot of cars with all the risks that entails, but my experience was pleasant because they are a reliable company, well established with several branches, Mrs. Rebeca was the one who assisted me Excellent, but in general a very good work team CONGRATULATIONS.
I highly recommend them, I loved the attention they gave me.
Terrible, don't buy there, they make only temporary fixes, terrible service from mechanics and supervisors, avoid headaches!
They sell frozen products from La Huerta, and I really liked it.
Small store, it has the basics, if you are in the center and need a basic basket... You can visit it there... No lines without problems to make your purchases hehehejw
I like to buy good service on items that lack variety but they give me a very valuable discount in these times
I think the prices could be improved and supervise that all products have the price written down or, failing that, a price checker would have the service and friendliness of the employees very good.
En alimentos para mascotas, no hay para gato, solo para perro..una sola marca el costal no muy accesible  el costo.. en general hay muy poca variedad en productos..

They don't answer phones. They do not pay attention to giving information about your shipment. They themselves returned a package for no reason and without warning. When you demand their response (if they respond) it is because they lack personnel. I don't recommend it unless you want to get angry and lose your sales.

Deplorable, mediocre service, they are liars. The packages arrive at the destination branch for days and do not leave the route. They don't answer the phone. Months suffering WITH THE SAME THING because of your mediocrity because my supplier is entrenched with you. Not even how to save me unfortunately, THEY'RE SHAME!!!!

TERRIBLE SERVICE!!!
They send you the package to the new ranch and they are not responsible!!!
Quick and attentive service, I didn't take long to receive my package.
Excellent attention. Very good prices. Much better than other parcel services and their deliveries are on time.
A VERY provincial and chayotero newspaper. The facilities are nothing out of this world.
Excellent map of this beautiful city.
Good facilities :D
Good local information
Great place
Too many visits for a simple task and representatives still didn't clear anything.....

Wasn't really happy at all, I had to travel a long way to get to the closest Telcel, they took several hours to fix my Modem that just froze all of a sudden. They supposedly fixed it but said they couldn't try it there because the moded would register that spot as the adress so I took it home and by the time I connected the modem it turned on but now a message appeared on the screen saying the modem is not compatible with the Sim card to change it to a compatible Modem. Now I have to travel again for almost 2 hours to get to my closest Telcel, really not happy about this specially since I haven't been ae to use more than 70% of my megabytes and I still have to pay the full month.
Wonderful attention thanks to Miguel Rosas for the information provided
Very Slow service, personal who help you are rude
Telhell avoid at all costs !

nombre: Financiera Independencia S. A. de C. V.

reviews.text: They are children of the vrga and their interest is going to 400 percent, look for another loan option like the popular fund, here if you don't want to pay more than triple the interest

They charge a lot of interest and don't waive any of it if you pay the bill early. In addition to the biweekly payments of $500, for example, only $15 goes toward the principal, and everything else is pure interest charges... I don't like it...
Good place to apply for a loan if you need it, although the interest seems a bit high to me

MY EXPERIENCE IN CORTAZAR FINANCIAL IS THAT I HAVE A BAD IMPRESSION BECAUSE THE MANAGER DORA ALICIA DOES NOT TREAT CUSTOMERS WELL. ON THE 15TH OF THE PRESENT, I RECOMMENDED MRS. GUADALUPE VILLANUEVA DE VILLAGRAN. AND I WAS VERY ANNOYED BECAUSE AT THE TIME I WENT TO REQUEST THE COMPANY'S SERVICES THEY WERE STRONGLY DENIED SINCE THEY SAID TO WAIT UNTIL I FINISHED HAVING LUNCH OR EATING I HAVE PHOTOS WHERE THE OFFICE IS COMPLETELY ALONE WITHOUT STAFF TO ATTEND.
They like to be Chingue and Chingue even if you don't belong and they literally force you to look for the damn druggists

They don't even deserve a star.
Be careful fraud for sure.
I made a procedure in September of last year. We paid the money and now the supposed lawyer does not respond....
A total fraud. I wish all the people who have been defrauded by this notary could file a legal claim to proceed.

My experience with the notaries in Celaya had always been very good, in fact I considered them to be very professional (I carried out procedures in 5 notaries before)... until I came to this notary. Unfortunately my experience was very bad, a procedure that took almost a year, when normally it is carried out in a couple of months, I could understand that for various reasons, as long as it was explained clearly, but unfortunately when you call the reception things get worse, I consider that the person who is in this position has zero sensitivity with customer treatment, he tells you in a very beaten way that he does not know, that he will call you later, that he will notify the Lic who handles your procedure, etc. etc. Very bad service for which you pay and it is not cheap at all. I do not recommend it, unfortunately I did not choose it so that I could have a shared responsibility with the decision, it was assigned by the real estate company.

I sold a house and everything was great, but now that I want to do another procedure they answer me very badly, they contact me with the lawyer Maricarmen, I ask her my question and she asks me if I am a seller, I tell her no, that I am an advisor and He responds ‚ÄúAh gee‚Äù with a mocking tone and with an upset voice he responds as if he was treating me like a fool, perhaps because of the question I asked him, I think he is not professional at all in his treatment, because it was not the way to answer. We have to pay more attention to the people they put in charge, because a notary office that I had recommended so much, today completely disappointed me.

Terrible Notary without exception all its staff, trained to provide bad service, especially the Notary Carlos Hurtado, lying people, thieves (plus the supposed lawyer Salvador Gonz√°lez) few professionals, I do not recommend them at all.
And don't waste time locating the notary because he will never be available.

Excellent attention from everyone, the graduate is a very attentive person who listens and resolves any administrative problem. I was able to provide support for any questions regarding my process via WhatsApp, which made everything easier for me.
Good and fast service
Mild

reviews.text: Ok
Cool

They serve when they want, how they want, to whom they want. They take a while to attend to you, they pass on your shift and then the person in charge does nothing and seeing that there are people, she tells you to wait for them to attend to you and she... Just watching... Bad service, bad company... I'm about to change... It's already been too much with Movistar...
Efficient service, they explain something quickly but well, place to park, nice place, comfortable, in general good service, just wait for the service.
Limited parking spaces, regular attention from associates, the highlight: the very friendly security guard

It is a place that still does not take care of its attention times. You go to a specific service and they take at least 20 minutes initially to give you a "review" to see what else they can sell you. This review has nothing to do with what you requested.
On the other hand, the price of the tires is not competitive. Being a better option. Nieto Tires. (it is not commercial but we do compare prices and models)
Very good service and the teacher who does the alignment is a good person.
Manuel is a great mother, they were able to fix something that the insurance couldn't in 3 months!
Very good attention, service and very affordable prices
The place is recommended, a wide variety of tires, qualified labor and time expectations are met subject to additional details than those reported. Responsible and professional work.

Good

Terrible attention when calling the phone, I thought the problem was with my cell phone because every time I called they pretended to ask me and hung up, no matter how many times you call they will always hang up on you. And apparently they've been doing it for a while.
I don't recommend it

One of the worst places to get spare parts in all of Celaya. Their level of arrogance is incredible. They think they are above the customer. What really happens is that intelligence is chasing them, but they are very fast. This type of people are a disappointment, if you can even call them that.

El telefono les vale vrg,acabo de marcar y solo te preguntan que necesitas,y cuando les dices solo se hacen pendejos y al final te cuelgan,y cuando vuelves a marcar te cuelgan el telefono....para el que me atendio....chtm

nombre: S√≥lo Qu√≠mica de M√©xico S.A. de C.V.
University of the Center of Baj√≠o

reviews.text: I had the great opportunity to study and complete my higher education at this great university. I really respect every teacher and administrator who works here, they provide an excellent quality education and the best thing is that you can study and work at the same time. I will definitely return to continue preparing with them.

Communication is very poor, there is no timely response to situations such as the fact that more than 5 years ago they still have not given me an answer about the Doctorate in Education, which they opened WITHOUT REVOE, they have not had the slightest intention of refunding my money, nor delivering my documentation. I no longer want to study the doctorate with you because you changed the academic plan, but I have not had a response from the University either. Very bad and all for not reporting in due time, for trusting you and Ms. Ana Lorena Pe√±a, who by the way never showed her face.

Excellent school, authorized to issue certificates, degrees and digital Federal ID, so graduating is very fast, with executive courses only on Saturdays or two hours in the morning, with more than 25 years of experience and an excellent academic level of Bachelor's, Master's and Doctorate degrees.

Very good place for people looking to do a bachelor's, master's or PhD. Very good facilities and organization. And the professionals who work here have very good service. If you are looking to continue working and studying, it is a very good option.
Extensive facilities. Bathrooms with few rounds of cleaning, without mirrors. Very good teaching and administrative staff. Affordable prices for tuition and mixed modality of studies.
